p: RSVs were obtained from virus stocks collected between July 2000 and June 2016 from nasopharyngeal aspirates (NPAs) and throat swabs of children (ages from 0.1â€“97.7 months) who had been hospitalized with acute respiratory tract infection in pediatric wards. Ethical approval for this study was obtained from the Mackay Memorial Hospital Committee and informed consent was waived (16MMHIS015).
